website_summaries.verdict: A must-have for anyone who wants to heat small spaces and needs a portable heater with a small footprint; not suited for very spacious areas.
pros: Provides efficient room heating with dual-fan technology that distributes warmth quietly
Lightweight, slim design saves space and can be mounted to a wall with the included hardware
cons: May not provide enough warmth to effectively heat large spaces
Has a strange odor at first that may dissipate with use

customer_reviews.title: Best big-room heater out there!
customer_reviews.text: Impressive! Heats our 350 sq foot 3rd floor with no other supplemental heating source. In an hour from turning this thing on, the space went from 58 degrees to 67 degrees and in 2 hours it was 75 degrees, in February! Amazing. And unless you turn the fan on (which I don't), there is absolutely NO noise. It's silent. And does a fabulous job.
customer_reviews.author: Wildberry

customer_reviews.title: DANGEROUS — DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I’d had this for less than two weeks and was in bed reading when I looked up and saw the plug smoking. I jumped up and yanked the plug out, and it had burned/melted through to the socket cover/plate. (The “hot” prong had burn marks and had shifted in the plastic landslide). Filled the room with burning plastic smell — lovely for breathing in, I’m sure. Sending it back, obviously, and not fast enough.
customer_reviews.author: Tay

customer_reviews.title: The fan function is a little lame and does not increase heat distribution all that much
customer_reviews.text: Works well but takes a long time to hear a room. The fan function is a little lame and does not increase heat distribution all that much.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnna

customer_reviews.title: Why no off switch?
customer_reviews.text: A nice sleek design and has been a good room addition so we don’t have to run the house furnace all the time. I took one star off because of one odd feature that is slightly annoying. There’s no on/off switch. You just have to turn the dial to zero but the light always stays on, so at a glance you cannot tell if it’s off or on unless you place your hand to feel heat. A switch with the light turning off would be so simple.
customer_reviews.author: M. Clouse

customer_reviews.title: DANGEROUS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two. Within three months both began emitting a foul odor and making clicking sounds. Then both started tripping breakers. Threw them both within a dumpster and praised God my family was not hurt. Do not buy this product. I could understand if one malfunctioned but both the same way?
customer_reviews.author: boniccal

customer_reviews.title: Not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these to heat a small workshop. Both died after about a year of service. After the overly complicated warranty refund process mandated by the manufacturer, I didn't even bother to go through the same intentional hoops by the manufacturer for the second failure - just trashed the second unit and bought a competitor's model as a relacement. Bottom line: this convection heater puts out a decent amount of heat with sufficient time ... when they are working (before they die, far too early for the price). This was my experience ... yours may vary.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great unit , , ,Amazingly, the unit survived the trip - the box didn't.
customer_reviews.text: This unit is exactly what I was looking for. It takes the chill out of the air, warms the room and is very quiet. However, I'm really lucky it made it here in 1 piece as the boxed unit was sent in a larger box with absolutely no packing, bubble wrap, peanuts, nothing - and had obviously been banged around inside the box as evidenced by the crushed box corner and side box damage. Also, the strip of tape that went down the length of the box, closing the left and right side flaps was off center and only secured 1/2 the length. I didn't see anywhere where I could state this information, so it went here.

product_meta.title: De'Longhi Convection Panel Heater, Full Room Quiet 1500W, Freestanding / Easy Install Wall Mount, Adjustable Thermostat, Programmable Timer, White - Slim Style HSX3315FTS
product_meta.description: This sleek, stylish panel heater by De'Longhi is perfect for any application and any decor. With instant heater and its unique dual fan system the De'Longhi Slim Style heater quickly warms up your coldest rooms. Don't have enough space? With its slim design and convenient wall mountable option, you can virtually put this heater anywhere. It is ideal for use as supplementary or spot heating in the bedroom, living room, office or anywhere in the home. You can customize your heating needs with the adjustable thermostat and three heat settings. You can rest easy knowing that this heater has a safety thermal cut-off, so it doesn't overheat, an internal tip-over switch in case the unit becomes unstable and power/caution indicator lights.
